product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies No-See-Um Headnet - Special Buy
long_description: The lightweight, breathable Ultimate Survival Technologies No-See-Um Headnet protects your head from mosquitoes and other potentially disease-carrying insects while keeping you cool and comfortable. No-see-um nylon mesh netting prevents even the smallest insects from reaching you; black mesh is easy to see through. No-See-Um Headnet fits over most hats; tapered neck with elastic keeps bugs out. Special buy.
